profile.name: Amalia
profile.title: Junior FrontEnd Developer
profile.description:
After several years as Helpdesk operator I've decided to switch to Software Developer.

I'm looking for a job as a Junior Frontend Developer where I can learn and give my best.

interestingFacts.fact:
I like Tech, Inline Skating, Astronomy and Nature
I'm from Málaga but I live in Madrid from 2009, now I'm looking for a path change in my career to become a FrontEnd Developer.

challenges.description: Development, deploy and support prevention of occupational hazards project.
